html:

The Only Agency is seeking an enthusiastic and detail-oriented Assistant Digital and Social Media Coordinator to support the team in managing digital platforms, branding materials, and social media strategies.

The Only Agency is seeking an enthusiastic and detail-oriented Assistant Digital and Social Media Coordinator to support the team in managing digital platforms, branding materials, and social media strategies. The ideal candidate will bring creativity, organizational skills, and a strong grasp of social media management and design tools. This is an exciting opportunity for someone looking to grow their skills in a fast-paced, creative environment.

About The Only Agency
At The Only Agency, we champion creative leaders who persistently redefine trends and push the limits in the fashion, beauty, and entertainment industries. We are masters at establishing connections and pairing creatives to meet the needs of our celebrity, brand, and editorial partners.

As a creative management agency, we represent wardrobe stylists, makeup artists, hair stylists, manicurists, photographers, creative directors, and more. With offices in New York, Los Angeles, and London, we are at the heart of the industries we serve.

Objectives of this Role
● Assist in managing the agency’s digital platforms, including maintaining social media accounts and updating the website.
● Support the creation of marketing materials, pitch decks, and presentations in collaboration with the team.
● Contribute to developing content strategies that align with business objectives and brand identity.
● Help analyze market trends, consumer needs, and competitors to ensure social media and branding strategies are effective.

Responsibilities
● Assist with content creation of social media graphics, website updates, and branding materials.
● Help maintain and update the agency's website, ensuring all content is current and aligned with the brand’s vision.
● Create and schedule social media posts across platforms, ensuring consistency in voice and tone.
● Collaborate with the creative team to brainstorm ideas and develop concepts for marketing and pitch materials.
● Monitor social media analytics and provide performance reports to inform future strategies.

Skills and Qualifications
● Degree in marketing, design, communications, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
● Proficiency with design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign), Canva, or similar software.
● Knowledge of social media platforms and tools (e.g., Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, TikTok).
● Strong attention to detail with an eye for design and layout.
● Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
● Ability to prioritize tasks, meet deadlines, and adapt to a fast-paced environment.

Preferred Qualifications
● Basic knowledge of website platforms like Webflow, WordPress or Squarespace.
● Familiarity with analytics tools (Google Analytics, social media insights) to measure content performance.
● Experience in a creative or agency environment is a plus.

If interested, please send your resume and inquiry to info@theonly.agency with subject ‘Assistant Digital and Social Media Coordinator Application.'

@theonly.agency

The Only Agency Is Hiring An Agent Assistant In Los Angeles

The Only Agency is seeking a highly motivated, detail-oriented, and proactive Assistant Agent based in Los Angeles to join our team and support the Director of Styling and Styling Agents in managing and cultivating artist relationships.
